Html:
Is it possible to use prism server-side ? I want to have modules and infrastructure project to be instantiated on an asp.net project (webservices) in iis . What should I do with CreateShell method ?

Or is it recommended to use something like NServiceBus instead ?

Hi

Prism targets WPF & Silverlight and applications created with either of those technologies run on the client side (explained here and here). A couple of p&p assets that are useful to create modular applications that run on the server side are the Web Client Software Factory and the Web Guidance project that is currently being developed on codeplex.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
